title: Remove “Same day delivery” promise from marketing copy

requirements.summary: Remove all “same day” / “same-day” delivery promise language from user-facing copy and replace with non-committal wording.
acceptanceCriteria: The Home page no longer includes the phrase “same-day” / “same day” in the hero paragraph (currently mentions “express same-day delivery”).
The Services preview section no longer includes “Same-day and next-day delivery” wording in the Express Delivery card description.
The Value Props section no longer includes “same-day and next-day service” wording in the “Lightning Fast” value proposition.
The Services page “Domestic Courier” description no longer includes “From same-day to standard shipping”.
A repository-wide check confirms there are no remaining user-facing occurrences of “same day” or “same-day” related to delivery promises in the frontend pages/components updated for this change.

file_operations.description: Update the hero paragraph copy to remove the “express same-day delivery” promise and replace with wording that communicates speed without promising same-day delivery.
Update the Express Delivery card description to remove “Same-day and next-day delivery” language and replace with non-committal express/priority wording that does not promise same-day delivery.
Update the “Lightning Fast” value proposition description to remove “same-day and next-day service” and replace with wording that highlights speed without promising same-day delivery.

Update the “Domestic Courier” service description to remove “From same-day to standard shipping” and replace with phrasing that describes multiple service speeds without promising same-day delivery. After edits, perform a repository-wide search within frontend for remaining user-facing “same day” / “same-day” mentions tied to delivery promises and correct any found in the touched pages/components.
